headline: Higher Gas Prices Boost Range Resources
summary: Range Resources pays a 0.9% dividend and has $1 billion in share buyback authorization. Click here to find out why RRC stock is a Hold.

headline: Petrobras Partners With Constellation for Major Well P&A Project
summary: PBR signs a contract with Constellation for a shallow-water well P&A project offshore Brazil, marking a key milestone in decommissioning efforts.

raw.headline: Petrobras Partners With Constellation for Major Well P&A Project
raw.summary: PBR signs a contract with Constellation for a shallow-water well P&A project offshore Brazil, marking a key milestone in decommissioning efforts.

headline: GeoPark Streamlines Operations With Divestment of Non-core Assets
summary: GPRK divests non-core assets in Colombia and Brazil, focusing on cost efficiency and strategic growth with expected annual savings of $5-$7 million.

raw.headline: GeoPark Streamlines Operations With Divestment of Non-core Assets
